entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
